TopicTitle: [Closed] KSP Experimental Tester Applications! Thanks to all who applied!

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

Attentive to detail, got a bunch of free time and love KSP? Apply!

Looking to get volunteer experience in the games industry and not sure where to start? Apply!

Need an excuse to give your significant other or family for playing KSP more? Apply!

The applications for a volunteer position on our Experimental Testing Team are now open here: [http://goo.gl/forms/VQfXnWTZMN](https://goo.gl/forms/VQfXnWTZMN)

Thanks and let me know if you have any questions below!

Sorry, I missed this post.

I was busy filling out the form (got the link from the devnotes) ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Is there a required age?

> 
> Is there a required age?

You have to agree you're over 13 when you start.
Applying now! Hope there isn't an age limit

> 
> You have to agree you're over 13 when you start.

exceptions?
Sorry, guys, but testers must be 18+.

Wow, really?

>

Specific reason?

> 
> Sorry, guys, but testers must be 18+.

C'mon. Why is there an age limit?

Aw. I would love to do this, but unfortunately I don't have the time or the under-the-hood expertise.

...maybe you could let me access new versions because I'm a *Very* Famous YouTuber\* who can be given the honor of playing stuff before others do?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T00:15:41Z" title="07/22/2015 12:15  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by UpsilonAerospace**

> 
> Specific reason?

I understand that Testers have to agree to a verbal NonDisclosure Agreement (NDA). Under the law in many countries, this constitutes a contract and only those over 18 are legally able to enter into contracts.

> 
> C'mon. Why is there an age limit?

Legals. Evidently minors can't sign confidentiality agreements?
Age limit is probably because the age required to sign a (Non Disclosure Agreement) NDA in the country of origin for Squad.

Just signed up ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). I'm also curious as to how one gets onto the media group? I would love to release a preview video along with the rest of the KSP YouTubers/Streamers if that is possible.

> 
> C'mon. Why is there an age limit?

If I had to guess, legal reasons. One of the prompts is asking if you would sign an NDA.

> 
> Specific reason?

Because the Experimentals guys have to agree to an NDA and under most countrys' laws you must be 18 or older to agree to a legally binding contract.

EDIT: Why do all replies to this thread appear to require moderator approval?
